About.title: Get to know me better

About.name: Kasemsarn Purisarn
About.heading: Turning ideas into
About.bio1: I'm a Full-Stack Developer with a passion for building exceptional digital experiences. With expertise in both frontend and backend technologies, I create seamless, scalable applications that make a difference.
About.bio2: My journey in tech has led me to work on diverse projects, from modern web applications to complex enterprise solutions. I believe in writing clean, maintainable code and staying up-to-date with the latest technologies.

Skills.title: Technologies I work with

Skills.alwaysLearning: Always learning and exploring new technologies to deliver the best solutions

Projects.title: Featured Projects
Projects.subtitle: A selection of projects I've worked on, showcasing my skills and expertise

authHub.title: Authentication Hub
authHub.description: Centralized authentication application with multi-type consent management, role-based access control, comprehensive admin capabilities, and seamless registration flow with auto sign-in. Supports subdomain cookie sharing for integration with other applications.

healthLog.title: Health Log
healthLog.description: A personal health monitoring platform for recording and tracking body metrics including body fat, muscle mass, BMR, and BMI with historical data analysis.

webBlog.title: Content Blog Platform
webBlog.description: A blog platform that uses Strapi CMS to manage and display content.

ecommerce.title: E-Commerce Platform
ecommerce.description: An e-commerce platform powered by Saleor for online shopping and product management.
